channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Energy storage industry set aggressive goals for 2025 — and already crushed them
item.description: The battery storage industry in the U.S. has grown in leaps and bounds in recent years, surpassing its most aggressive targets to become one of the largest new sources of power on the grid.

item.title: The ISS Is Out of Parking Spots for the First Time Ever. Here’s Why
item.description: All eight docking ports at the ISS are occupied. That's never happened before.

item.title: Logitech CEO says AI devices are just "solutions looking for a problem"
item.description: Is AI-powered hardware pointless or have we not yet built a proper one?

item.title: Avec Warner Bros, Netflix s’empare aussi des jeux Mortal Kombat, Batman Arkham, Hogwarts Legacy…
item.description: Netflix s'empare donc de Warner Bros Discovery, pour une somme qui dépasse les 82 milliards de dollars. Une acquisition colossale qui redessine le paysage du divertissement… mais aussi du jeu vidéo, car la plateforme de streaming glisse aussi dans sa besace plusieurs studios WB — dont les créateurs de Mortal Kombat et de la saga Batman: Arkham.

item.title: Sony’s new PS5 DualSense controller might have way more battery life
item.description: It might not look much different on the outside, but the newest version of the PS5’s DualSense controller could feature a major improvement in battery life. Polish modder Modyfikator89 shared in a post on X that the new DualSense V2 variant, model number CFI-ZCT2W, lasted for more than 15 hours of continuous play in a […]

item.title: Trump’s Tiny Car Wish Isn’t The Way to Make Americans Want Smaller Cars
item.description: America is a big country that likes big vehicles, no matter how cute those kei cars can be.

item.title: In its first DSA penalty, EU fines X €120M for ‘deceptive’ blue check verification system
item.description: The EC is taking issue with the fact that X, the social network formerly known as Twitter, has been allowing anyone to buy a "blue checkmark," the platform's long-standing symbol that a user has been verified to be who they are claiming to be.

item.title: The connectivity problem hiding in smart bins and heart monitors
item.description: As IoT becomes more embedded across industries, they all rely on the same unseen foundation: uninterrupted, intelligent connectivity.

item.title: L’IA de Google dérape : clichés racistes et logos détournés, Nano Banana Pro fait polémique
item.description: Le nouveau générateur d'images de Google, Nano Banana Pro, fait polémique. En question : la création systématique d'images véhiculant le complexe du « sauveur blanc » et l'utilisation non autorisée de logos d'organisations humanitaires.

item.title: 9 Best Lubes (2025): Water-Based, Silicone, Natural Oils
item.description: For the most sensitive parts of the human body, friction is the enemy. Here’s how to keep it at bay with our favorite lubes made of water, silicone, or natural oil.

item.title: It’s code red for ChatGPT
item.description: A smidge over three years ago, OpenAI threw the rest of the tech industry into chaos. When ChatGPT launched, even billed as a "low-key research preview," it became immediately clear that OpenAI was showing the world a new way of computing. Lots of other companies, most notably Google, had to immediately scramble to catch up […]

item.title: Asus Rog Xbox Ally : cette console portable qui renferme un vrai PC est bradée à moins de 500 € juste à temps pour Noël
item.description: Bonne nouvelle pour ceux qui espéraient une baisse de prix sur la dernière console d’Asus, la ROG Xbox Ally : elle est désormais proposée à 499 euros au lieu de 599 euros.

item.title: This tiny magnetic e-reader sticks to the back of your iPhone
item.description: A Chinese company named Xteink has announced the X4, a compact e-reader with a 4.3-inch E Ink screen that’s more pocketable than the smallest Kindle or Kobo. Like a wireless power bank, the e-reader can magnetically attach to the back of an iPhone, Pixel 10, or any device that supports Qi2 or Apple’s MagSafe. If […]

item.title: That ‘Pluribus’ Twist Wasn’t Even the Biggest Gut-Punch of the Episode
item.description: Carol takes a road trip to see a friendly (?) face on the latest episode of Apple TV's sci-fi hit.

item.title: Samsung Cyber Week sale ends Sunday: don't miss these record-low deals on TVs, tablets, Galaxy Watch, and more
item.description: Samsung's huge Cyber Week sale features incredible holdover deals from the brand's Black Friday sale - don't miss these deals before they end on Sunday.

item.title: 13 years later, the bold and terrifying sci-fi game Routine is finally here
item.description: It has been 13 long years since Aaron Foster last spoke to The Verge. Back then, Foster's tiny, three-person studio Lunar Software was touting sci-fi horror game Routine with a striking vision: Foster hoped to suck players into the desolate eeriness of its moon base setting, which was equal parts immersive and grounded. Foster ended […]

item.title: Welcome to the wellness surveillance state
item.description: This is Optimizer, a weekly newsletter sent every Friday from Verge senior reviewer Victoria Song that dissects and discusses the latest phones, smartwatches, apps, and other gizmos that swear they're going to change your life. Optimizer arrives in our subscribers' inboxes at 10AM ET. Opt in for Optimizer here. The other day I was staring […]

item.title: 7 new movies and TV shows to watch on Netflix, Prime Video, HBO Max and more this weekend (December 5)
item.description: It's a top-heavy week of new movies for the first streaming recommendations round-up of December 2025.

item.title: How to watch Investec Champions Cup 2025/26: Live stream rugby union for FREE, TV channels, preview, Round 1 fixtures
item.description: All the ways to watch Investec Champions Cup 2025/26 live streams online from anywhere for FREE, as the 24 top clubs from Europe and South Africa clash.

item.description: Looking for NYT Strands answers and hints? Here's all you need to know to solve today's game, including the spangram.

item.title: Cette fenêtre de Windows 11 change de design 30 ans après son dernier relooking
item.description: Microsoft va modifier le design d'une fenêtre bien connue des utilisateurs de Windows. Cela faisait 30 ans qu'il n'avait pas bougé ou presque.

item.title: Le retour du malware ClayRat : ce virus désactive Play Protect avant de piller vos données
item.description: ClayRat fait son retour sur Android. Plus redoutable que la dernière fois, le malware commence par désactiver discrètement Google Play Protect. Il s’infiltre ensuite au cœur du smartphone pour accéder à vos données personnelles et financières.

item.title: Verizon just surprised us with one of its best deals of the entire year - get four iPhone 17 Pro for free without a trade-in
item.description: This $1,099 device is currently free with the carrier's entry-level plan

item.title: Voyager 2 Caught Uranus on a Bad Weather Day in 1986, Study Finds
item.description: Hold the jokes—this is serious news.

item.title: I test 4K Blu-rays for a living and these are the 12 discs I’d buy movie lovers for Christmas
item.description: If you're looking for 4K Blu-rays to add to your collection or gift to a fan this Christmas, these are my top 12 discs that I've personally tested.

item.title: Petco confirms security lapse exposed customers’ personal data
item.description: The pet company has published almost no details about what happened, who was affected, and what personal data was exposed.

item.title: L’assistant IA de Meta intégrera les contenus de plusieurs médias
item.description: L’assistant d’intelligence artificielle (IA) de Meta, Meta AI, va intégrer, en temps réel, des contenus publiés par plusieurs médias d’information, notamment CNN, Fox News et Le Monde, en vertu d’un accord annoncé vendredi.

item.title: Hackers observed injecting legitimate banking apps with malicious code
item.description: Poisoned apps are lurking on the internet, so make sure to double-check your sources before downloading anything.

item.title: Gift guides
item.description: All of TechRadar's gift guides in one place, to help you find the perfect gifts for your loved ones (and for yourself).

item.title: Meta strikes AI licensing deals with CNN, Fox News, and USA Today
item.description: On Friday, Meta announced that its AI chatbot will now respond with information from CNN, Fox News, USA Today, and People Inc.’s portfolio, as part of a new partnership with the companies. The deal comes as publishers continue to sue AI companies for stealing content. The New York Times filed a lawsuit against AI startup […]

item.title: The incredible DJI Osmo Pocket 3 action cam is $270 off at Best Buy today
item.description: Best Buy slashes the price of the incredible DJI Osmo Pocket 3, now $529.99

item.title: Everyone wants to eat Nvidia’s lunch
item.description: But the deeper you look into the economic complexities and competitive dynamics of the AI chip market, the more you realize Google, Amazon, or anyone else isn’t going to topple Nvidia. So far, Nvidia has provided the vast majority of the processors used to train and operate large AI models like the ones that underpin ChatGPT. Tech companies and AI labs don’t like to rely too much on a single chip vendor, especially as their need for computing capacity increases, so they’re looking for ways to diversify. And so players like AMD and Huawei, as well as hyperscalers like Google and Amazon AWS, wh...

item.title: À moins de 15 €, cette manette pour Nintendo Switch 2 est une bonne alternative à la Pro
item.description: Vous n’avez pas envie de vider votre compte pour équiper tout le salon en manettes Nintendo ? PowerA qui opère sous licence officielle, dégaine justement une salve de promotions sur ses modèles filaires habillés aux couleurs des licences mythiques de la firme de Kyoto. Des contrôleurs solides, stylés, parfaitement compatibles… et surtout proposés à 14,99 € au lieu de 29,99 € sur la Fnac. ...

item.title: Skillshare Brings Creative Courses Into Post-Black Friday, One Month Free Trial and 20% Off the First Year Subscription
item.description: Learning a new skill doesn't have to put a dent in your wallet.

item.title: Ditch your Air, grab a Pro! This deal at Best Buy gets you a MacBook Pro 14 for cheap
item.description: Upgrade to the MacBook Pro 14 (M4 Pro) in this incredible trade-in deal from Best Buy

item.title: Comment des poèmes absurdes parviennent à contourner les protections de l’IA
item.description: Obtenir ce que l'on veut des chatbots IA, y compris des contenus illicites, est un sport pratiqué depuis l'avènement de ChatGPT. Il existe plusieurs techniques de jailbreak pour casser les garde-fous mis en place par les créateurs de modèles de langage ; on peut maintenant ajouter à la liste la « poésie conflictuelle ».

item.title: Netflix is officially buying Warner Bros. What happens next?
item.description: It's official: Netflix is buying Warner Bros. in a sale worth a towering $82.7 billion.

item.title: C’est confirmé : Netflix fait le rachat du siècle pour s’emparer de Warner Bros (Harry Potter, Game of Thrones…)
item.description: Netflix confirme le rachat de Warner Bros pour 82,7 milliards de dollars.

item.title: Netflix to acquire Warner Bros. in a disruptive deal valued at $82.7B
item.description: In one of the most groundbreaking deals the streaming world has ever seen, Netflix acquires Warner Bros. for $82.7 billion.

item.title: Block insiders talk about how Jack Dorsey turned Square into a multidimensional financial services giant
item.description: Starting with a single point-of-sale product in 2009, the company now has its hand in payments, crypto, streaming, and numerous other ventures. On November 19, Block Inc. held its first Investor Day in three years. Jack Dorsey, the company’s cofounder, chief executive, and “Block Head,” took to the stage and summarily posed what many investors and others in the industry were likely thinking. ...

item.title: Stop Asking Walton Goggins If He’ll Play the ‘Fallout’ Games
item.description: The actor has once again reminded the world that being part of a video game adaptation doesn't mean you have to have had video game experience.

item.title: GoTrax Mustang Electric Bike Review: Punchy and Tiny
item.description: This nimble, compact ebike packs plenty of punch, but doesn’t offer a wide range of sizes.

item.title: Spartacus had ‘loads of fights behind the scenes’ according to one star – but don’t expect the same from sequel series House of Ashur
item.description: Spartacus: House of Ashur might be "rough" on camera, but behind the scenes, it was nothing like its predecessor.

item.title: Toyota présente une voiture électrique ultra-performante au nom mythique : le premier modèle à batterie solide ?
item.description: Lexus, la marque premium de Toyota, vient de dévoiler sa LFA Concept. Cette voiture électrique reprend le nom d'une sportive mythique et promet beaucoup… sans pour autant dévoiler sa fiche technique, même si elle pourrait bénéficier des fameuses batteries solides.

item.title: Cet appareil révolutionnaire et abordable permet de recharger des piles non rechargeables
item.description: Vous en avez marre d'entasser vos piles usagées, sans jamais les emmener à un point de collecte ? Avec ce boitier, vous pourriez tout simplement les réutiliser.

item.title: Cloudflare says it’s investigating the outage that brought down Zoom and LinkedIn
item.description: It was the second such crash to impact the company in less than a month. Internet infrastructure company Cloudflare on Friday said it was investigating an outage that took place in the morning that brought down several global websites including LinkedIn, Zoom and others, the second such crash to affect the company in less than three weeks.Cloudflare said the issue had been resolved, and that it was was “investigating issues with Cloudflare Dashboard and related APIs,” or application programming interface that allow software systems to communicate with each other.The company said the outage was...

item.title: 8 ans de cyberattaques sur Windows : Microsoft corrige enfin une faille exploitée par des pirates russes, chinois et sud-coréens
item.description: Microsoft corrige enfin une faille Windows exploitée depuis 2017. Après des années d’attaques menées par des cybercriminels chinois, russes et sud-coréens, l’éditeur a discrètement colmaté la brèche. Microsoft a par contre refusé de l'’annoncer comme une vraie mise à jour de sécurité.

item.title: Waymo’s robotaxis are under investigation for passing stopped school buses
item.description: The National Highway Traffic Safety Administration has opened an investigation into Waymo following reports that the company’s robotaxis illegally drove past stopped school buses in Austin, Texas. In a letter sent to Waymo on Wednesday, the federal regulator’s Office of Defects Investigation asked for detailed information on Waymo’s fifth-generation self-driving system and expressed concern that […]...

item.title: Microsoft 365 is hiking prices for businesses - here's how much it will cost you
item.description: Microsoft is increasing M365/O365 prices for business/government customers, but not without merit.

item.title: The best laptops you can get
item.description: Buying the right laptop can be stressful. It’s likely one of the bigger tech purchases you’ll make, and there are a ludicrous number of models, sizes, form factors, and configurations to pick from. We review and test a wide swath of them here at The Verge, and we’re constantly considering what’s the best and who […]

item.title: « Même si on code grossièrement, ça marche » : pourquoi des consoles comme la PS5 Pro coûtent en réalité moins cher aux créateurs de jeux
item.description: Alors que certains jugent inutile la course à la puissance dans le monde des consoles, un développeur japonais affirme que des machines plus performantes permettent paradoxalement de réduire les dépenses liées à la création de jeux vidéo.

item.title: Samsung’s Ballie robot is delayed again – and now we know why
item.description: With Ballie now past its planned 2025 debut, Samsung tells TechRadar it is “continuing to refine and perfect the technology” before release.

item.title: Netflix stock sinks as the streaming giant reveals plans to buy Warner Bros. and HBO in $83 billion megadeal
item.description: If approved, the deal would mark a seismic shift in entertainment, giving Netflix control of popular IP from the DC Universe, Harry Potter, and more. Netflix has announced that it intends to buy legendary Hollywood studio Warner Bros. in a deal valued at approximately $82.7 billion.

item.title: Pluribus turns a ‘caloric deficit’ into a nightmare
item.description: Every week since Pluribus' premiere, I've presented a handful of burning questions I have about what's coming next. And most of the time I really want to know the answer. This is a show where mysteries are baked into the premise, with a slow-burn structure that can make it very satisfying when the answers start […]

item.title: Chinese hackers used Brickworm malware to breach critical US infrastructure
item.description: CISA and friends are sounding the alarm, once again, for Chinese state-sponsored hackers
